com.radiotelescope.controller

Class AuthUserController

  • BaseRestController
    • com.radiotelescope.controller.AuthUserController

  • public class AuthUserController
extends BaseRestController

    Rest Controller that will grab and return pertinent user authentication information so that it can be stored on login

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuthUserController(RetrieveAuthUserService retrieveAuthUserService, Logger logger)
      Rest Controller that will grab and return pertinent user authentication information so that it can be stored on login

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result execute()
      Calls the RetrieveAuthUserService.execute method that will either return errors or a class UserSession object, depending on if the user is logged in or not

      • Methods inherited from class com.radiotelescope.controller.BaseRestController

        getLogger, getResult, setResult

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Result execute()

        Calls the RetrieveAuthUserService.execute method that will either return errors or a class UserSession object, depending on if the user is logged in or not
